Subskills.name: Armada
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of bombs fired.

Subskills.name: Fire All
Subskills.description: Decreases the cooldown of land ahoy.

Subskills.name: Concentrated Blast Radius
Subskills.description: Significantly decreases the area of effect radius of land ahoy and increasing the amount of cannon balls.

Subskills.name: Rum Infused Ammo
Subskills.description: Bombs have a chance to explode an additional time.

Subskills.name: Blunder Bombs
Subskills.description: Increases explosion area of effect radius of land ahoy.

Subskills.name: Warheads
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by land ahoy.

Subskills.name: Strategic Airstrikes
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to fire additional bombs towards nearby monsters.

Subskills.name: Food for Cannon
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Reign of Fire
Subskills.description: Damage type is changed to Fire. Explosive Barrels rain from the sky inflicting burning on hit

Subskills.name: MOAB
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to fire larger bombs knocking monsters airborne on hit dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Fuel to the Fire
Subskills.description: Increases bomb damage based on explosion area of effect stat.

Subskills.name: Land Annihilation
Subskills.description: Drop a reduced amount of big bombs on a significantly larger radius. Land Ahoy now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Traveling Bombardment
Subskills.description: Mark a location and fire bombs landing from your location to target location in a narrow line.
